name: ZipStreamer
description: A small server which can combine any number of URLs into a zip file, and stream it on the fly to a client.

ZS_URL_PREFIX.description: [OPTIONAL] if set, requires that the URL of files included in the zip start with this prefix. Useful to preventing others from using your server to serve their files.

ZS_COMPRESSION.description: [OPTIONAL] if set to 'DEFLATE', will enable zip compression on output files. WARNING - enabling compression uses CPU, and will greatly reduce throughput of server
